languages.text: "Я постараюсь убедить Каллигоса решить конфликт мирным путем".

traits.locale_text: "Я постараюсь убедить Каллигоса решить конфликт мирным путем".

languages.text: "I will try and convince Calligos to seek a peaceful resolution to the conflict."
languages.original_text: "Я постараюсь убедить Каллигоса решить конфликт мирным путем".

traits.locale_text: "I will try and convince Calligos to seek a peaceful resolution to the conflict."
"I will try and convince Calligos to seek a peaceful resolution to the conflict."

"I will try and convince Calligos to seek a peaceful resolution to the conflict."
"I will try and convince Calligos to seek a peaceful resolution to the conflict."

languages.text: « J'essaierai de convaincre Calligos de trouver une issue pacifique au conflit. »
languages.original_text: "I will try and convince Calligos to seek a peaceful resolution to the conflict."

traits.locale_text: « J'essaierai de convaincre Calligos de trouver une issue pacifique au conflit. »

languages.text: “我会想办法说服卡里戈斯，看看能不能和平解决冲突。”
languages.original_text: "I will try and convince Calligos to seek a peaceful resolution to the conflict."

traits.locale_text: “我会想办法说服卡里戈斯，看看能不能和平解决冲突。”

languages.text: "Ich werde versuchen, Calligos zu überzeugen, eine friedliche Lösung für den Konflikt zu finden."
languages.original_text: "I will try and convince Calligos to seek a peaceful resolution to the conflict."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde versuchen, Calligos zu überzeugen, eine friedliche Lösung für den Konflikt zu finden."

languages.text: «Trataré de convencer a Calligos de llegar a una solución pacífica».
languages.original_text: "I will try and convince Calligos to seek a peaceful resolution to the conflict."

traits.locale_text: «Trataré de convencer a Calligos de llegar a una solución pacífica».

languages.text: 「和平的な解決法を模索するようカリゴスを説得しようと思う」
languages.original_text: "I will try and convince Calligos to seek a peaceful resolution to the conflict."

traits.locale_text: 「和平的な解決法を模索するようカリゴスを説得しようと思う」

languages.text: "Calligos'la görüşüp barışçıl bir çözüm için kendisini ikna etmeye çalışacağım."
languages.original_text: "I will try and convince Calligos to seek a peaceful resolution to the conflict."
